summary:
Adds 4 fortify health spells to the game. Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master level spells.
Obtainable from the Riverwood Trader atm. will add it to more merchants. Also drops from mages but is rare.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 4 fortify health spells to the game. Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master level spells.
Obtainable from the Riverwood Trader atm. will add it to more merchants. Also drops from mages but is rare.

Lesser Fortify Health (Apprentice): 25 for 60sec
Greater Fortify Health (Adept): 50 for 60sec
Grand Fortify Health (Expert): 75 for 60sec
Master Fortify Health (Master): 100 for 60sec

I am planning to add more features to this mod that are relevant.
Comment with suggestions, problems or feedback.
Check out my other mods and endorse if you like them :)
author: Windrider494
